He actually seems to hit her with some question, where she would hesitate to answer or would have provided a provocative comment. Yet she didn't. And whether we all are or aren't in the favor of Sunny, its what you are going to see on the television in an interview. While India is known as a country of culture and history,  there are many people who find it offensive for an Indian girl to work in porn industry. That's what this interviewer was trying to point out to her, and might be hoping to get a provocative reply to show(hit buzz) on the Indian television. He didn't get that chance and yes, Sunny nailed it high time. But still, freedom of media speech and questioning must be bounded under some rules. She has chosen a profession for herself, under the freedom of individual so you don't need to tell her what she should have done or not. Basically she got the money to talk and still slapped in the face of questioner. In this case, there are multiple questioner, because interviews are scripted and questions are made with a team.
